name: OrganismsTestsInLowerRespiratorySpecimenExcludingSputumByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Organisms (Tests in Lower Respiratory Specimen [Excluding Sputum] by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of organisms in lower respiratory specimens (excluding sputum) by culture and identification methods.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: bacteria, virus, fungus, culture in lower respiratory specimen),(Exclusion Criteria: sputum)
